title: 'Good' Friday News | Guests: Bill O’Reilly & Sen. Tom Cotton | 4/10/20
description:
It’s Good Friday, America! Glenn shares the best news he could find. Meanwhile, we’re debating mail-in elections! Trump’s gut hope to reopen the country by Easter is proving accurate as the numbers decline. Nancy Pelosi claimed there was “no data” that said small businesses need more help. Bill O’Reilly gives his big story of the week: The far Left is using the pandemic to destroy the American system through panic and socialist solutions. A surprising number of people seem willing to pick the virus over another Trump term. And Bill finally watched “Tiger King” and has a less-than-stellar review. Glenn has an Easter message for the country. And Sen. Tom Cotton, who “saw the coronavirus coming,” joins to describe what he sees now.
